sentences.en: British prisons remain disgracefully crowded and insanitary.
sentences.cn: 英国监狱仍然拥挤不堪，卫生条件恶劣。

sentences.en: During winter, many people swim and the pool is crowded.
sentences.cn: 冬季来游泳的人很多，泳池人满为患。

sentences.en: Franklin joined her and the children whenever his crowded calendar allowed.
sentences.cn: 只要能从百忙之中抽出空，富兰克林就会陪在妻儿身边。

sentences.en: Fred and Volodia sweltered at night in the stuffy, crowded cabins.
sentences.cn: 弗雷德和博洛迪亚晚上挤在不通风的船舱里热得要命。

sentences.en: In midsummer every town is impossibly crowded.
sentences.cn: 仲夏时节，每个城市都出奇地拥挤。

sentences.en: In those crowded streets her attire did not rate a second glance.
sentences.cn: 在那些拥挤的街道她的穿着并未引起注意。

sentences.en: One group of journalists were crowded into a minibus.
sentences.cn: 一群记者挤进一辆小型公共汽车。

sentences.en: Police blocked off the road as hotel staff and guests crowded around.
sentences.cn: 当酒店工作人员和旅客们都聚拢过来时，警察封锁了那条路。

sentences.en: She slept fitfully, her mind crowded with confusing dreams.
sentences.cn: 她时睡时醒，脑子里做着各种怪梦。

sentences.en: The baggage hall was crowded and noisy.
The best housing they could afford was crowded and filthy.
sentences.cn: 他们能住得起的最好的住所也非常拥挤、肮脏不堪。

sentences.en: The market-place and street were crowded with those who'd come to barter.
sentences.cn: 市场和街道上挤满了前来做物物交换的人。

sentences.en: The pool is smallish and more crowded than most.
sentences.cn: 这个池子略微小些，比大多数的池子更挤。

sentences.en: The train was very crowded, and we had to stand.
sentences.cn: 火车很挤，我们只好站着。

sentences.en: They crowded more closely around the stretcher.
sentences.cn: 他们在担架旁围得更紧了。

sentences.en: Thousands of refugees are packed into over-crowded towns and villages.
sentences.cn: 成千上万的难民涌入拥挤不堪的城镇和村庄。

trans.tran_en: too full of people or things
